content: Yes, some of these events have gone virtual due to the pandemic. For example, Slush Tokyo held a virtual event in March 2021, and the Tokyo Developer Meetup is currently hosting virtual events. Other events, such as Hacker News Tokyo and Code Chrysalis, are offering online courses and events. It's important to keep in mind that event schedules can change frequently, especially in these uncertain times, so it's a good idea to stay up to date by checking the event websites and social media pages for the latest updates.
